title: Acqua di Gio by Giorgio Armani - Classic Aquatic Men's Fragrance - 50ml
description: Discover the timeless aquatic scent of Acqua di Gio by Giorgio Armani in this 50ml bottle. Launched in 1996, this classic men's fragrance features a fresh and invigorating blend of citrus, marine notes, and wood. With top notes of bergamot and lime, a heart of sea notes and jasmine, and a base of patchouli and cedarwood, Acqua di Gio offers a clean and refreshing aroma ideal for daily wear or special occasions. Its elegant bottle design complements the sophisticated nature of the fragrance.
key_features: Classic aquatic fragrance with citrus, marine notes, and wood
Timeless and refreshing scent capturing the Mediterranean Sea
Ideal for daily wear or special occasions
Elegant bottle design reflecting the sophistication of the fragrance

title: Acqua di Gio by Giorgio Armani - Classic Aquatic Men's Fragrance - 100ml
description: Embrace the refreshing aquatic scent of Acqua di Gio by Giorgio Armani with this 100ml bottle. Launched in 1996, this iconic men's fragrance offers a clean and invigorating blend of citrus, marine notes, and wood. With its top notes of bergamot and lime, a heart of sea notes and jasmine, and a base of patchouli and cedarwood, Acqua di Gio is perfect for those who appreciate a classic, Mediterranean-inspired scent. The larger bottle size provides excellent value for both daily wear and special occasions.
